title: HUD Problem *super dumb*
body: Alrighty so soon i got myself a project lucian border and decided i wanted to uninstall it, i accidently threw out ALL OF THE HUD FILES FOR THE GAME in the trash and then b4 i realized it was 2 late. *on a mac* waht do i do ;-;{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body:
You can run a repair of the game's files by launching League, hitting the question mark in the top corner, then clicking repair.

Let me know if this helped.
